nodes.text: Vinyor Tesh's mother was a female researcher who worked on the planet of Manaan. During the Devastation of Manaan, she was killed along with her partner by the invading Imperials. Her young son was rescued by a visiting Jedi called Laotah, who brought him to Coruscant to be trained at the temple.

Vinyor Tesh's mother was mentioned in the Codex entry for Master Vinyor Tesh in the 2019 expansion Onslaught to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic by the company BioWare.
